Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.gltf

Interface GltfLoader


  • public interface GltfLoader
    Imports 3D models and related data (such as animations and materials) from a glTF file.
    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  GltfLoader.ImportListener
      Listener for asynchronous import result.

      Fields

      Indicates the flag used to import all data.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultResourceImportFlags

        int getDefaultResourceImportFlags​()
        Obtains the default flag for importing resources.
        Returns:
        Returns the default flag for importing resources.

      • getDefaultSceneImportFlags

        int getDefaultSceneImportFlags​()
        Obtains the default flag for importing scenes.
        Returns:
        Returns the default flag for importing scenes.

      • loadGltf

        GltfData loadGltf​(String gltfUri)
        Loads a glTF file with a specified URI.
        Parameters:
        gltfUri - Indicates the URI of the glTF file to be loaded.
        Returns:
        Returns GltfData containing the load result.

      • loadGltf

        GltfData loadGltf​(ByteBuffer gltfBytes)
        Loads a glTF data buffer of bytes.
        Parameters:
        gltfBytes - Indicates the glTF data to be loaded.
        Returns:
        Returns GltfData containing the load result.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the glTF data buffer is not a direct buffer.

      • importGltf

        GltfImportData importGltf​(GltfData gltfData,
                          int flags)
        Imports the glTF data to the engine synchronously.
        Parameters:
        gltfData - Indicates the glTF data in a parsed glTF file.
        flags - Indicates the flag that specifies the resources to be imported, which can be set using getDefaultResourceImportFlags().
        Returns:
        Returns a report containing the import result and the resources that have been imported.

      • importGltfAsync

        Task importGltfAsync​(GltfData gltfData,
                     int flags,
                     GltfLoader.ImportListener listener)
        Creates a task for asynchronously importing glTF data.

        This method does not import any data. Instead, it creates a task for importing data.

        Parameters:
        gltfData - Indicates the glTF data in a parsed glTF file.
        flags - Indicates the flag that specifies the resources to be imported, which can be set using getDefaultResourceImportFlags().
        listener - Indicates the listener that monitors the import.
        Returns:
        Returns the task for asynchronously importing glTF data.

      • importScene

        Entity importScene​(int sceneIndex,
                   GltfData data,
                   GltfImportData importData,
                   Entity rootEntity,
                   int flags)
        Imports a glTF scene from specified glTF data and resources.
        Parameters:
        sceneIndex - Indicates the index of the glTF scene to be imported.
        data - Indicates the glTF data that contains structure information of the glTF scene to be created.
        importData - Indicates the glTF resources that have been loaded, such as meshes and skins.
        rootEntity - Indicates the root entity of the glTF scene to be imported. This parameter can be null.
        flags - Indicates the flag that specifies the resources to be imported, which can be set using getDefaultResourceImportFlags().
        Returns:
        Returns the root entity of the glTF scene.
